Uses of Class
gruppe.irc.IRCConnection

  • Packages that use IRCConnection 
    Package Description
    gruppe.irc
    This package contains the IRCConnection class itself and the MessageEvent class that is used to pass information about events from the IRCConnection class to the attached listener objects.

    • Uses of IRCConnection in gruppe.irc

      Methods in gruppe.irc that return IRCConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRCConnection TabManager.getConnection() 
      Methods in gruppe.irc with parameters of type IRCConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IRCClient.newConnection(IRCConnection newConnection, java.lang.String serverName, java.lang.String alias)
      Method that receives connections from IRCConnection, First checking if there are any empty frames (like the ones when starting the ircclient).
      void TabManager.setConnection(IRCConnection ourConnection)
      Sets connection.
